description:
Available languages: english - french 

Presentation: 

Warning, this game is planned for children, ryhtme is slow. It is easy and therefore not very interesting for adults. 
Rabbits for children is a game designed specially for young children. When a level is successful, your child wins a photo of the rabbit. It can free up to 20 pictures through the 20 levels of play 

Difficulty is measured for the youngest! 

Game Type: casual game - skill game 

Your child will collect pictures of rabbits in various levels of play Rabbits for children is a skill game where the child should touch the cards in return before they disappear. 

Using the click screen in 20 levels suitable for children. 

Features: 

- Entertaining game on the theme of the Rabbits 
-Three levels of difficulty (the hardest by default) 
- Intuitive control interface and clear 
- Automatic backup of progression. 
- Growth awarded 20 pictures of rabbits available in the collection 
- 20 levels to accomplish 
- A simple game for younger where he can play without your help
